item.title: A discrete valued time series model; Polio data
item.description: Illustrate how a time series of count data can be modelled as a GLMM with a Poisson response

item.title: Stochastic volatility models for financial time series
item.description: Stochastic volatility models are used in mathematical finance to describe the evolution of asset returns, which typically exhibit changing variances over time.

item.title: Delta smelt life cycle model
item.description: A state-space multistage model to evaluate population impacts in the presence of density dependence.

item.title: Skate mortality: Bayesian state-space model
item.description: Bayesian state-space model example from the NCEAS non-linear modelling working group

item.title: Theta-logistic population growth model
item.description: State-space model from the NCEAS non-linear modelling working group
